original_text: When Moses entered the tent, the pillar of cloud would descend and stand at the entrance of the tent, and the Lord would speak with Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 회막에 들어갈 때에 구름 기둥이 내려 회막 문에 서며 여호와께서 모세와 말씀하시니

sentences.original_text: the pillar of cloud would descend
and stand at the entrance of the tent,
and the Lord would speak with Moses.
